https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe specializza la classe Tipo di Attività per poter rappresentare la classificazione di un organizzazione privata sulla base del proprio scopo o tipo di attività svolta. Nel contesto italiano, le istanze di questa classe sono quelle del vocabolario controllato Ateco2007 utilizzato nel registro imprese. Il vocabolario controllato è disponibile al seguente URI https://w3id.org/italia/controlled-vocabulary/classifications-for-organizations/ateco-2007
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:label: Private Organization Activity Type

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta un'organizzazione privata ufficialmente registrata presso un registro nazionale (registro imprese).
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:label: Associazione privata

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe specializza la classe Tipo di Attività per poter rappresentare la classificazione di un organizzazione pubblica sulla base del proprio scopo o tipo di attività svolta. Nel contesto italiano le istanze di questa classe sono quelle del vocabolario controllato Cofog2009 disponibile al seguente URI: https://w3id.org/italia/controlled-vocabulary/classifications-for-organizations/cofog-2009
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:label: Public Organization Activity Type

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:comment:
Questa classe rappresenta un'organizzazione pubblica. Una pubblica amministrazione e qualsiasi altra organizzazione di nautra pubblica può essere modellata utilizzando questa classe. In generale,  individui di questa classe sono organizzazioni registrate presso l'Indice della PA (IPA).
Questa classe deriva dall'analoga classe del Core Public Organization Vocabulary.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:label: Amministrazione pubblica

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta la cateogoria dell'organizzazione pubblica. Le istanze di questa classe possono essere modellate come concetti dello standard skos di un vocabolario controllato. Esempi includono: "Agenzie ed Enti per il Turismo", "Città Metropolitane", "Presidenza del Consiglio, Minsiteri e Avvocatura dello Stato".
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:label: Categoria Organizzazione Pubblica

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta organizzazioni miste pubblico-private.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/P.rdfs:label: Organizzazione Pubbico-Privata

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/R.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta un evento di sostituzione per un'organizzazione. Come la sostituzione di una pubblica amministrazioe con un'altra.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/R.rdfs:label: Replacement

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/S.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta una scissione per un'organizzaizone.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/S.rdfs:label: Scission

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/S.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta lo stato di un'organizzazione privata (impresa). Essa assume i seguenti valori predefiniti: "registrata" "cancellata" "in fase di registrazione".
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/S.rdfs:label: Stato

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/S.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta una generica unità di supporto o unità/divisione dell'organizzazione. Un nome alternativo potrebbe essere anche Dipartimento. Essa, nel contesto italiano, si suddivide in due tipologie di unità di supporto: Area Organizzativa Omogena e Ufficio (unità organizzativa). Questa è una classe astratta istanziata nei dati con i due precedenti tipi.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/S.rdfs:label: Department

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/e.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta il servizio di fatturazione elettronica così come definito nell'ambito dell'indice della pubblica amministrazione (IPA).
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/COV\/e.rdfs:label: Servizio Fatturazione Elettronica

ontology.dc:creator: http://spcdata.digitpa.gov.it/Amministrazione/agid
ontology.dc:description: Questa è l'ontologia del profilo applicativo italiano sulle organizzazioni (pubbliche e private). Essa consente di modellare le principali informazioni sull'anagrafica delle organizzazioni pubbliche e private (inclusa l'articolazione degli uffici e dei relativi responsabili).
ontology.dc:title: Ontologia delle Organizzazioni (pubbliche e private)- Profilo applicativo italiano
ontology.rdfs:comment: Questa è l'ontologia del profilo applicativo italiano sulle organizzazioni (pubbliche e private). Essa consente di modellare le principali informazioni sull'anagrafica delle organizzazioni pubbliche e private (inclusa l'articolazione degli uffici e dei relativi responsabili).
ontology.rdfs:label: Italian Organization (Public or Private) ontology
ontology.owl:versionInfo: Version 0.11 - Modified 29 April 2019 - Fixed some typos and restrictions; deleted some properties and classes already imported in other ontologies. Revised Participation and Employment classes in order to better align them to TimeIndexedRole and TimeIndexedEvent. Refactoring of labels and minor fixes.

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/di.rdfs:comment: La relazione diretta di successore tra due entità. Questa proprietà non è transitiva, poiche il successore diretto di una certa entità non è transitivo.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/di.rdfs:label: directly follows

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/di.rdfs:comment: La relazione diretta di predecessore. La relazione non è transitiva.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/di.rdfs:label: directly precedes

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/fo.rdfs:comment: Relation between entities for expressing sequences.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/fo.rdfs:label: follows

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:comment: Property that associates an entity with its description.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:label: ha descrizione

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:comment: La object property che permette di rappresentare il primo membro di una sequenza.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:label: has first member

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:comment: Object property che permette di rappresentare una specifica entità come l'ultimo membro di una sequenza.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:label: ha ultimo membro

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:comment: La proprietà che modella la relazione di membership.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:label: ha membro

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:comment: Questa object property permette di associare un entità ad un topic.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/ha.rdfs:label: ha tema

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/is.rdfs:label: Inverse object property of has first member.

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/is.rdfs:comment: Inverse object property of has last member
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/is.rdfs:label: is last member of

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/is.rdfs:comment: Inverse object property of has member.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/is.rdfs:label: is member of
La object property che permette di associare un tema ad un'entità. E' l'inversa di hasTopic.

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/pr.rdfs:comment: La relazione per rappresentare il predecessore di un entità in una sequenza.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/pr.rdfs:label: precede

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/de.rdfs:comment: Datatype property che associa un valore letterale a una cosa.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/de.rdfs:label: description

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ac.rdfs:comment: La classe delle attività svolte da qualche agente.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ac.rdfs:label: Activity

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ag.rdfs:comment: Any agentive Object , either physical (e.g. a person, a robot, an oak), or social (e.g. a corporation, an institution, a community).
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ag.rdfs:label: Agent

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ch.rdfs:comment: La classe delle caratteristiche, intese come aspetti, attributi o qualità di un'entità. Ex. una quantità, qualità estetica, colore, etc.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ch.rdfs:label: Caratteristica

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Co.rdfs:comment: La classe che include collezioni di qualsiasi cosa, ex. gruppi, raccolte, comunità, etc.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Co.rdfs:label: Collection

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Co.rdfs:comment: Un oggetto definito nel contesto di determinate descrizioni. Una volta definito esso può essere utilizzato in altre descrizioni.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Co.rdfs:label: Concept

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/De.rdfs:comment:
La classe degli oggetti costruiti socialmente (testi, valori, categorie, relazioni, contesti) usati per descrivere qualcos'altro in modo structuratto.
Gli esempi includono i piani (come descrizioni strutturate di azioni da eseguire ex. in un processo industriale), le diagnosi (come descrizioni strutturate di situazioni osservate ex. clinicamente), le spiegazioni (come testi strutturati per chiarire ex. un concetto in un sistema normativo), osservazioni oggettive (come insiemi di valori strutturati che identificano una situazione rilevante ex. da un sistema di sensori).
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/De.rdfs:label: Description

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/En.rdfs:comment: Anything: real, possible, or imaginary, which some modeller wants to talk about for some purpose.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/En.rdfs:label: Entity

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ev.rdfs:comment:
Any entity that typically flows in time, either in the physical or social world  Examples include athmospheric phenomena, concerts, travels, institutional processes, etc.
It also represents a relational context created by an observer on the basis of a frame'
Events are opposable to objects, since events typically flow in time, aggregating multiple objects during their flow, while objects tend to be stable in a certain time interval.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ev.rdfs:label: Event or Situation

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Lo.rdfs:comment: Classe che rappresenta il concetto di luogo. Le istanze di questa classe possono essere entità di qualsiasi tipo intese come luogo di qualcos'altro: luoghi geografici, coordinate, contenitori, etc.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Lo.rdfs:label: Location

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ob.rdfs:comment:
Any entity that tends to be stable in time, either in the physical or social world. Examples include homes, cities, organizations, works of art, natural objects, artifacts, words, ideas, etc.
Objects are opposable to events, since events typically flow in time, aggregating multiple objects during their flow, as with working, travelling or leisure activities, industrial or athmospheric processes, etc.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Ob.rdfs:label: Object

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Sy.rdfs:comment: La classe dei sistemi. Esempi ne sono i sistema politici, fisici o economici.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/Sy.rdfs:label: Sistema

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/To.rdfs:comment: La classe che include temi, argomenti, categorie, discipline, etc. Per esempio: la matematica, lo svago, le arti marziali, etc., intesi come temi di un discorso o di una categorizzazione.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/l0\/To.rdfs:label: Tema

ontology.dc:description: This ontology provides the foundational level of the ontological stack of OntoPiA. The name L0 stands for Level-0 ontology as it provides the basic conceptual foundations to the whole stack. This ontology is inspired from DOLCE 0 (http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/d0.owl)
ontology.dc:creator: http://spcdata.digitpa.gov.it/Amministrazione/agid
ontology.owl:versionInfo: Version 0.8 - 24 April 2019 - review Topic class, l0:EventOrSituation disjountness axiom.
ontology.rdfs:label: Top level ontology L0 - Level-0
ontology.rdfs:comment: This is the top level ontology of OntoPiA
ontology.dc:title: Ontologia fondazionale di OntoPiA - Livello 0

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/at.rdfs:comment: Relation between any thing and time interval
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/at.rdfs:label: al tempo

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà è utilizzata per associare un oggetto che può essere collocato nel tempo ai giorni della settimana.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:label: ha giorno della settimana

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà è utilizzata per specificare il periodo temporale di validità.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:label: ha durata

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:comment: Property that links a time indexed event to a month of the year.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:label: ha mese dell'anno

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:comment: Property that links a time indexed event to a temporal entity.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:label: ha entità temporale

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:comment: Property that links a time indexed event to its year.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ha.rdfs:label: ha anno

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:comment: Inverse property of has day of week.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:label: is day of week of

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:comment: Inverse object property of hasDuration. It associates a duration with a time indexed event.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:label: is duration of

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:comment: Property that links a month of the year to a time indexed event.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:label: is month of the year of

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:comment: Property that links a temporal entity to a time indexed event.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:label: is temporal entity of

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:comment: Property that links a year to a time indexed event.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:label: is year of

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/da.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta una generica data / istante di tempo
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/da.rdfs:label: data

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/da.rdfs:comment: Property defined for linking an instance of the class DayOfWeed to its literal representation expressed as xsd:gDay.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/da.rdfs:label: day

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/du.rdfs:comment: Property that associates a duratin value with a time interval.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/du.rdfs:label: durata

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/en.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta la data di fine di un intervallo temporale.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/en.rdfs:label: data di fine

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:comment: La proprietà rappresenta l'istante di tempo che può coincidere con un tempo di generazione o con la data di inizio dell'intervallo di tempo.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/is.rdfs:label: istante di tempo

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/mo.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà è utilizzata per modellare la data di ultima modifica (o il tempo di aggiornamento)
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/mo.rdfs:label: data ultima modifica

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/mo.rdfs:comment: Property defined for linking an individual of the class MonthOfTheYear to its literal representation expressed as xsd:gMonth.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/mo.rdfs:label: mese

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/st.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta la data di inizio di un intervallo temporale.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/st.rdfs:label: data di inizio

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ti.rdfs:comment: Abstract property used to represent the time as literal.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ti.rdfs:label: tempo

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ye.rdfs:comment: Datatype property for linking a year to its literal representation as xsd:gYear.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/ye.rdfs:label: anno

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Da.rdfs:comment: Classe che rappresenta l'insieme dei giorni della settimana.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Da.rdfs:label: Day of the Week

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Du.rdfs:comment: La classe che rappresenta la durata.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Du.rdfs:label: Durata

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Mo.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta un mese dell'anno.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Mo.rdfs:label: Mese dell'anno

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Te.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta un'entità di natura temporale.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Te.rdfs:label: Entità temporale

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Ye.rdfs:comment: Class for representing a year as individual.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/TI\/Ye.rdfs:label: Anno

ontology.dc:creator: http://spcdata.digitpa.gov.it/Amministrazione/agid
ontology.dc:description: Questo il profilo applicativo italiano dell'ontologia sul tempo. Esso definisce concetti quali Intervallo di Tempo, istante temporale, evento indicizzato nel tempo
ontology.dc:title: Ontologia del Tempo - Profilo applicativo italiano
ontology.rdfs:comment: Questa è l'ontologia del profilo applicativo del tempo.
ontology.rdfs:label: Italian Time ontology
ontology.owl:versionInfo: Version 0.6 - Modified on 23 April 2019 - Refactoring l0:Event in l0:EventOrSituation

http:\/\/schema.org\/previousStartDate.rdfs:comment: Used in conjunction with eventStatus for rescheduled or cancelled events. This property contains the previously scheduled start date. For rescheduled events, the startDate property should be used for the newly scheduled start date. In the (rare) case of an event that has been postponed and rescheduled multiple times, this field may be repeated.
http:\/\/schema.org\/previousStartDate.rdfs:label: previousStartDate

http:\/\/schema.org\/disambiguatingDescr.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription
http:\/\/schema.org\/disambiguatingDescr.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.

http:\/\/schema.org\/identifier.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
http:\/\/schema.org\/identifier.rdfs:label: identifier

http:\/\/schema.org\/workPerformed.rdfs:label: workPerformed
http:\/\/schema.org\/workPerformed.rdfs:comment: A work performed in some event, for example a play performed in a TheaterEvent.

http:\/\/schema.org\/workFeatured.rdfs:label: workFeatured
http:\/\/schema.org\/workFeatured.rdfs:comment:
A work featured in some event, e.g. exhibited in an ExhibitionEvent.
       Specific subproperties are available for workPerformed (e.g. a play), or a workPresented (a Movie at a ScreeningEvent).

http:\/\/schema.org\/actor.rdfs:label: actor
http:\/\/schema.org\/actor.rdfs:comment: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

http:\/\/schema.org\/isAccessibleForFree.rdfs:label: isAccessibleForFree
http:\/\/schema.org\/isAccessibleForFree.rdfs:comment: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.

http:\/\/schema.org\/image.rdfs:label: image
http:\/\/schema.org\/image.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

http:\/\/schema.org\/funder.rdfs:label: funder
http:\/\/schema.org\/funder.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.

http:\/\/schema.org\/sponsor.rdfs:label: sponsor
http:\/\/schema.org\/sponsor.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports a thing through a pledge, promise, or financial contribution. e.g. a sponsor of a Medical Study or a corporate sponsor of an event.

http:\/\/schema.org\/additionalType.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
http:\/\/schema.org\/additionalType.rdfs:label: additionalType

http:\/\/schema.org\/potentialAction.rdfs:label: potentialAction
http:\/\/schema.org\/potentialAction.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.

http:\/\/schema.org\/duration.rdfs:comment: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.
http:\/\/schema.org\/duration.rdfs:label: duration

http:\/\/schema.org\/translator.rdfs:comment: Organization or person who adapts a creative work to different languages, regional differences and technical requirements of a target market, or that translates during some event.
http:\/\/schema.org\/translator.rdfs:label: translator

http:\/\/schema.org\/aggregateRating.rdfs:comment: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.
http:\/\/schema.org\/aggregateRating.rdfs:label: aggregateRating

http:\/\/schema.org\/composer.rdfs:comment: The person or organization who wrote a composition, or who is the composer of a work performed at some event.
http:\/\/schema.org\/composer.rdfs:label: composer

http:\/\/schema.org\/offers.rdfs:label: offers
http:\/\/schema.org\/offers.rdfs:comment: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event. Use businessFunction to indicate the kind of transaction offered, i.e. sell, lease, etc. This property can also be used to describe a Demand. While this property is listed as expected on a number of common types, it can be used in others. In that case, using a second type, such as Product or a subtype of Product, can clarify the nature of the offer.

http:\/\/schema.org\/inLanguage.rdfs:comment: The language of the content or performance or used in an action. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also availableLanguage.
http:\/\/schema.org\/inLanguage.rdfs:label: inLanguage

http:\/\/schema.org\/audience.rdfs:comment: An intended audience, i.e. a group for whom something was created.
http:\/\/schema.org\/audience.rdfs:label: audience

http:\/\/schema.org\/maximumAttendeeCapa.rdfs:label: maximumAttendeeCapacity
http:\/\/schema.org\/maximumAttendeeCapa.rdfs:comment: The total number of individuals that may attend an event or venue.

http:\/\/schema.org\/director.rdfs:label: director
http:\/\/schema.org\/director.rdfs:comment: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

http:\/\/schema.org\/sameAs.rdfs:label: sameAs
http:\/\/schema.org\/sameAs.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.

http:\/\/schema.org\/contributor.rdfs:label: contributor
http:\/\/schema.org\/contributor.rdfs:comment: A secondary contributor to the CreativeWork or Event.

http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntityOfPage.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage
http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntityOfPage.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.

http:\/\/schema.org\/endDate.rdfs:label: endDate
http:\/\/schema.org\/endDate.rdfs:comment: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

http:\/\/schema.org\/recordedIn.rdfs:label: recordedIn
http:\/\/schema.org\/recordedIn.rdfs:comment: The CreativeWork that captured all or part of this Event.

http:\/\/schema.org\/location.rdfs:comment: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.
http:\/\/schema.org\/location.rdfs:label: location

http:\/\/schema.org\/performers.rdfs:comment: The main performer or performers of the event—for example, a presenter, musician, or actor.
http:\/\/schema.org\/performers.rdfs:label: performers

http:\/\/schema.org\/performer.rdfs:comment: A performer at the event—for example, a presenter, musician, musical group or actor.
http:\/\/schema.org\/performer.rdfs:label: performer

http:\/\/schema.org\/eventStatus.rdfs:label: eventStatus
http:\/\/schema.org\/eventStatus.rdfs:comment: An eventStatus of an event represents its status; particularly useful when an event is cancelled or rescheduled.

http:\/\/schema.org\/startDate.rdfs:label: startDate
http:\/\/schema.org\/startDate.rdfs:comment: The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

http:\/\/schema.org\/typicalAgeRange.rdfs:comment: The typical expected age range, e.g. '7-9', '11-'.
http:\/\/schema.org\/typicalAgeRange.rdfs:label: typicalAgeRange

http:\/\/schema.org\/attendee.rdfs:comment: A person or organization attending the event.
http:\/\/schema.org\/attendee.rdfs:label: attendee

http:\/\/schema.org\/remainingAttendeeCa.rdfs:label: remainingAttendeeCapacity
http:\/\/schema.org\/remainingAttendeeCa.rdfs:comment: The number of attendee places for an event that remain unallocated.

http:\/\/schema.org\/subEvents.rdfs:label: subEvents
http:\/\/schema.org\/subEvents.rdfs:comment: Events that are a part of this event. For example, a conference event includes many presentations, each subEvents of the conference.

http:\/\/schema.org\/subEvent.rdfs:label: subEvent
http:\/\/schema.org\/subEvent.rdfs:comment: An Event that is part of this event. For example, a conference event includes many presentations, each of which is a subEvent of the conference.

http:\/\/schema.org\/eventSchedule.rdfs:comment: Associates an Event with a Schedule. There are circumstances where it is preferable to share a schedule for a series of repeating events rather than data on the individual events themselves. For example, a website or application might prefer to publish a schedule for a weekly gym class rather than provide data on every event. A schedule could be processed by applications to add forthcoming events to a calendar. An Event that is associated with a Schedule using this property should not have startDate or endDate properties. These are instead defined within the associated Schedule, this avoids any ambiguity for clients using the data. The property might have repeated values to specify different schedules, e.g. for different months or seasons.
http:\/\/schema.org\/eventSchedule.rdfs:label: eventSchedule

http:\/\/schema.org\/about.rdfs:comment: The subject matter of the content.
http:\/\/schema.org\/about.rdfs:label: about

http:\/\/schema.org\/subjectOf.rdfs:label: subjectOf
http:\/\/schema.org\/subjectOf.rdfs:comment: A CreativeWork or Event about this Thing.

http:\/\/schema.org\/superEvent.rdfs:comment: An event that this event is a part of. For example, a collection of individual music performances might each have a music festival as their superEvent.
http:\/\/schema.org\/superEvent.rdfs:label: superEvent

http:\/\/schema.org\/Event.rdfs:label: Event
http:\/\/schema.org\/Event.rdfs:comment: An event happening at a certain time and location, such as a concert, lecture, or festival. Ticketing information may be added via the offers property. Repeated events may be structured as separate Event objects.

http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntityOfPage.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage
http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntityOfPage.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.

http:\/\/schema.org\/legalName.rdfs:comment: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.
http:\/\/schema.org\/legalName.rdfs:label: legalName

http:\/\/schema.org\/makesOffer.rdfs:comment: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.
http:\/\/schema.org\/makesOffer.rdfs:label: makesOffer

http:\/\/schema.org\/ownershipFundingInf.rdfs:comment: For an Organization (often but not necessarily a NewsMediaOrganization), a description of organizational ownership structure; funding and grants. In a news/media setting, this is with particular reference to editorial independence. Note that the funder is also available and can be used to make basic funder information machine-readable.
http:\/\/schema.org\/ownershipFundingInf.rdfs:label: ownershipFundingInfo

http:\/\/schema.org\/publishingPrinciple.rdfs:comment:
The publishingPrinciples property indicates (typically via URL) a document describing the editorial principles of an Organization (or individual e.g. a Person writing a blog) that relate to their activities as a publisher, e.g. ethics or diversity policies. When applied to a CreativeWork (e.g. NewsArticle) the principles are those of the party primarily responsible for the creation of the CreativeWork.

While such policies are most typically expressed in natural language, sometimes related information (e.g. indicating a funder) can be expressed using schema.org terminology.
http:\/\/schema.org\/publishingPrinciple.rdfs:label: publishingPrinciples

http:\/\/schema.org\/leiCode.rdfs:comment: An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442.
http:\/\/schema.org\/leiCode.rdfs:label: leiCode

http:\/\/schema.org\/identifier.rdfs:label: identifier
http:\/\/schema.org\/identifier.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.

http:\/\/schema.org\/contactPoints.rdfs:label: contactPoints
http:\/\/schema.org\/contactPoints.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.

http:\/\/schema.org\/contactPoint.rdfs:label: contactPoint
http:\/\/schema.org\/contactPoint.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.

http:\/\/schema.org\/hasOfferCatalog.rdfs:label: hasOfferCatalog
http:\/\/schema.org\/hasOfferCatalog.rdfs:comment: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.

http:\/\/schema.org\/funder.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.
http:\/\/schema.org\/funder.rdfs:label: funder

http:\/\/schema.org\/sponsor.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports a thing through a pledge, promise, or financial contribution. e.g. a sponsor of a Medical Study or a corporate sponsor of an event.
http:\/\/schema.org\/sponsor.rdfs:label: sponsor

http:\/\/schema.org\/taxID.rdfs:label: taxID
http:\/\/schema.org\/taxID.rdfs:comment: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.

http:\/\/schema.org\/awards.rdfs:comment: Awards won by or for this item.
http:\/\/schema.org\/awards.rdfs:label: awards

http:\/\/schema.org\/award.rdfs:label: award
http:\/\/schema.org\/award.rdfs:comment: An award won by or for this item.

http:\/\/schema.org\/aggregateRating.rdfs:comment: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.
http:\/\/schema.org\/aggregateRating.rdfs:label: aggregateRating

http:\/\/schema.org\/department.rdfs:comment: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.
http:\/\/schema.org\/department.rdfs:label: department

http:\/\/schema.org\/image.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.
http:\/\/schema.org\/image.rdfs:label: image

http:\/\/schema.org\/interactionStatisti.rdfs:label: interactionStatistic
http:\/\/schema.org\/interactionStatisti.rdfs:comment: The number of interactions for the CreativeWork using the WebSite or SoftwareApplication. The most specific child type of InteractionCounter should be used.

http:\/\/schema.org\/hasProductReturnPol.rdfs:label: hasProductReturnPolicy
http:\/\/schema.org\/hasProductReturnPol.rdfs:comment: Indicates a ProductReturnPolicy that may be applicable.

http:\/\/schema.org\/hasMerchantReturnPo.rdfs:label: hasMerchantReturnPolicy
http:\/\/schema.org\/hasMerchantReturnPo.rdfs:comment: Indicates a MerchantReturnPolicy that may be applicable.

http:\/\/schema.org\/correctionsPolicy.rdfs:label: correctionsPolicy
http:\/\/schema.org\/correctionsPolicy.rdfs:comment: For an Organization (e.g. NewsMediaOrganization), a statement describing (in news media, the newsroom’s) disclosure and correction policy for errors.

http:\/\/schema.org\/unnamedSourcesPolic.rdfs:label: unnamedSourcesPolicy
http:\/\/schema.org\/unnamedSourcesPolic.rdfs:comment: For an Organization (typically a NewsMediaOrganization), a statement about policy on use of unnamed sources and the decision process required.

http:\/\/schema.org\/diversityStaffingRe.rdfs:comment: For an Organization (often but not necessarily a NewsMediaOrganization), a report on staffing diversity issues. In a news context this might be for example ASNE or RTDNA (US) reports, or self-reported.
http:\/\/schema.org\/diversityStaffingRe.rdfs:label: diversityStaffingReport

http:\/\/schema.org\/knowsLanguage.rdfs:label: knowsLanguage
http:\/\/schema.org\/knowsLanguage.rdfs:comment: Of a Person, and less typically of an Organization, to indicate a known language. We do not distinguish skill levels or reading/writing/speaking/signing here. Use language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard.

http:\/\/schema.org\/globalLocationNumbe.rdfs:label: globalLocationNumber
http:\/\/schema.org\/globalLocationNumbe.rdfs:comment: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

http:\/\/schema.org\/hasPOS.rdfs:label: hasPOS
http:\/\/schema.org\/hasPOS.rdfs:comment: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.

http:\/\/schema.org\/hasCredential.rdfs:label: hasCredential
http:\/\/schema.org\/hasCredential.rdfs:comment: A credential awarded to the Person or Organization.

http:\/\/schema.org\/actionableFeedbackP.rdfs:label: actionableFeedbackPolicy
http:\/\/schema.org\/actionableFeedbackP.rdfs:comment: For a NewsMediaOrganization or other news-related Organization, a statement about public engagement activities (for news media, the newsroom’s), including involving the public - digitally or otherwise -- in coverage decisions, reporting and activities after publication.

http:\/\/schema.org\/disambiguatingDescr.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
http:\/\/schema.org\/disambiguatingDescr.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

http:\/\/schema.org\/isicV4.rdfs:comment: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.
http:\/\/schema.org\/isicV4.rdfs:label: isicV4

http:\/\/schema.org\/owns.rdfs:label: owns
http:\/\/schema.org\/owns.rdfs:comment: Products owned by the organization or person.

http:\/\/schema.org\/dissolutionDate.rdfs:comment: The date that this organization was dissolved.
http:\/\/schema.org\/dissolutionDate.rdfs:label: dissolutionDate

http:\/\/schema.org\/diversityPolicy.rdfs:comment: Statement on diversity policy by an Organization e.g. a NewsMediaOrganization. For a NewsMediaOrganization, a statement describing the newsroom’s diversity policy on both staffing and sources, typically providing staffing data.
http:\/\/schema.org\/diversityPolicy.rdfs:label: diversityPolicy

http:\/\/schema.org\/seeks.rdfs:label: seeks
http:\/\/schema.org\/seeks.rdfs:comment: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).

http:\/\/schema.org\/knowsAbout.rdfs:comment: Of a Person, and less typically of an Organization, to indicate a topic that is known about - suggesting possible expertise but not implying it. We do not distinguish skill levels here, or relate this to educational content, events, objectives or JobPosting descriptions.
http:\/\/schema.org\/knowsAbout.rdfs:label: knowsAbout

http:\/\/schema.org\/location.rdfs:label: location
http:\/\/schema.org\/location.rdfs:comment: The location of for example where the event is happening, an organization is located, or where an action takes place.

http:\/\/schema.org\/serviceArea.rdfs:label: serviceArea
http:\/\/schema.org\/serviceArea.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where the service is provided.

http:\/\/schema.org\/areaServed.rdfs:label: areaServed
http:\/\/schema.org\/areaServed.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

http:\/\/schema.org\/brand.rdfs:label: brand
http:\/\/schema.org\/brand.rdfs:comment: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

http:\/\/schema.org\/foundingDate.rdfs:label: foundingDate
http:\/\/schema.org\/foundingDate.rdfs:comment: The date that this organization was founded.

http:\/\/schema.org\/numberOfEmployees.rdfs:comment: The number of employees in an organization e.g. business.
http:\/\/schema.org\/numberOfEmployees.rdfs:label: numberOfEmployees

http:\/\/schema.org\/sameAs.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
http:\/\/schema.org\/sameAs.rdfs:label: sameAs

http:\/\/schema.org\/duns.rdfs:label: duns
http:\/\/schema.org\/duns.rdfs:comment: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

http:\/\/schema.org\/subjectOf.rdfs:comment: A CreativeWork or Event about this Thing.
http:\/\/schema.org\/subjectOf.rdfs:label: subjectOf

http:\/\/schema.org\/events.rdfs:label: events
http:\/\/schema.org\/events.rdfs:comment: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.

http:\/\/schema.org\/event.rdfs:comment: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.
http:\/\/schema.org\/event.rdfs:label: event

http:\/\/schema.org\/naics.rdfs:label: naics
http:\/\/schema.org\/naics.rdfs:comment: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

http:\/\/schema.org\/vatID.rdfs:comment: The Value-added Tax ID of the organization or person.
http:\/\/schema.org\/vatID.rdfs:label: vatID

http:\/\/schema.org\/additionalType.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
http:\/\/schema.org\/additionalType.rdfs:label: additionalType

http:\/\/schema.org\/potentialAction.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
http:\/\/schema.org\/potentialAction.rdfs:label: potentialAction

http:\/\/schema.org\/ethicsPolicy.rdfs:label: ethicsPolicy
http:\/\/schema.org\/ethicsPolicy.rdfs:comment: Statement about ethics policy, e.g. of a NewsMediaOrganization regarding journalistic and publishing practices, or of a Restaurant, a page describing food source policies. In the case of a NewsMediaOrganization, an ethicsPolicy is typically a statement describing the personal, organizational, and corporate standards of behavior expected by the organization.

http:\/\/schema.org\/member.rdfs:comment: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.
http:\/\/schema.org\/member.rdfs:label: member

http:\/\/schema.org\/foundingLocation.rdfs:label: foundingLocation
http:\/\/schema.org\/foundingLocation.rdfs:comment: The place where the Organization was founded.

http:\/\/schema.org\/founders.rdfs:label: founders
http:\/\/schema.org\/founders.rdfs:comment: A person who founded this organization.

http:\/\/schema.org\/founder.rdfs:comment: A person who founded this organization.
http:\/\/schema.org\/founder.rdfs:label: founder

http:\/\/schema.org\/slogan.rdfs:comment: A slogan or motto associated with the item.
http:\/\/schema.org\/slogan.rdfs:label: slogan

http:\/\/schema.org\/memberOf.rdfs:comment: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.
http:\/\/schema.org\/memberOf.rdfs:label: memberOf

http:\/\/schema.org\/parentOrganization.rdfs:label: parentOrganization
http:\/\/schema.org\/parentOrganization.rdfs:comment: The larger organization that this organization is a subOrganization of, if any.

http:\/\/schema.org\/subOrganization.rdfs:comment: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.
http:\/\/schema.org\/subOrganization.rdfs:label: subOrganization

http:\/\/schema.org\/Organization.rdfs:comment: An organization such as a school, NGO, corporation, club, etc.
http:\/\/schema.org\/Organization.rdfs:label: Organization

http:\/\/schema.org\/publisherImprint.rdfs:label: publisherImprint
http:\/\/schema.org\/publisherImprint.rdfs:comment: The publishing division which published the comic.

http:\/\/schema.org\/audience.rdfs:comment: An intended audience, i.e. a group for whom something was created.
http:\/\/schema.org\/audience.rdfs:label: audience

http:\/\/schema.org\/position.rdfs:label: position
http:\/\/schema.org\/position.rdfs:comment: The position of an item in a series or sequence of items.

http:\/\/schema.org\/text.rdfs:label: text
http:\/\/schema.org\/text.rdfs:comment: The textual content of this CreativeWork.

http:\/\/schema.org\/caption.rdfs:comment: The caption for this object. For downloadable machine formats (closed caption, subtitles etc.) use MediaObject and indicate the encodingFormat.
http:\/\/schema.org\/caption.rdfs:label: caption

http:\/\/schema.org\/dateModified.rdfs:label: dateModified
http:\/\/schema.org\/dateModified.rdfs:comment: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed.

http:\/\/schema.org\/schemaVersion.rdfs:label: schemaVersion
http:\/\/schema.org\/schemaVersion.rdfs:comment: Indicates (by URL or string) a particular version of a schema used in some CreativeWork. For example, a document could declare a schemaVersion using an URL such as http://schema.org/version/2.0/ if precise indication of schema version was required by some application.

http:\/\/schema.org\/keywords.rdfs:comment: Keywords or tags used to describe this content. Multiple entries in a keywords list are typically delimited by commas.
http:\/\/schema.org\/keywords.rdfs:label: keywords

http:\/\/schema.org\/abstract.rdfs:comment: An abstract is a short description that summarizes a CreativeWork.
http:\/\/schema.org\/abstract.rdfs:label: abstract

http:\/\/schema.org\/temporal.rdfs:comment: The "temporal" property can be used in cases where more specific properties (e.g. temporalCoverage, dateCreated, dateModified, datePublished) are not known to be appropriate.
http:\/\/schema.org\/temporal.rdfs:label: temporal

http:\/\/schema.org\/accessModeSufficien.rdfs:comment: A list of single or combined accessModes that are sufficient to understand all the intellectual content of a resource. Expected values include:  auditory, tactile, textual, visual.
http:\/\/schema.org\/accessModeSufficien.rdfs:label: accessModeSufficient

http:\/\/schema.org\/playerType.rdfs:label: playerType
http:\/\/schema.org\/playerType.rdfs:comment: Player type required—for example, Flash or Silverlight.

http:\/\/schema.org\/interactionStatisti.rdfs:comment: The number of interactions for the CreativeWork using the WebSite or SoftwareApplication. The most specific child type of InteractionCounter should be used.
http:\/\/schema.org\/interactionStatisti.rdfs:label: interactionStatistic

http:\/\/schema.org\/citation.rdfs:comment: A citation or reference to another creative work, such as another publication, web page, scholarly article, etc.
http:\/\/schema.org\/citation.rdfs:label: citation

http:\/\/schema.org\/provider.rdfs:comment: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
http:\/\/schema.org\/provider.rdfs:label: provider

http:\/\/schema.org\/spatialCoverage.rdfs:comment:
The spatialCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the place(s) which are the focus of the content. It is a subproperty of
      contentLocation intended primarily for more technical and detailed materials. For example with a Dataset, it indicates
      areas that the dataset describes: a dataset of New York weather would have spatialCoverage which was the place: the state of New York.
http:\/\/schema.org\/spatialCoverage.rdfs:label: spatialCoverage

http:\/\/schema.org\/contentLocation.rdfs:comment: The location depicted or described in the content. For example, the location in a photograph or painting.
http:\/\/schema.org\/contentLocation.rdfs:label: contentLocation

http:\/\/schema.org\/duration.rdfs:comment: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.
http:\/\/schema.org\/duration.rdfs:label: duration

http:\/\/schema.org\/contributor.rdfs:comment: A secondary contributor to the CreativeWork or Event.
http:\/\/schema.org\/contributor.rdfs:label: contributor

http:\/\/schema.org\/dateCreated.rdfs:label: dateCreated
http:\/\/schema.org\/dateCreated.rdfs:comment: The date on which the CreativeWork was created or the item was added to a DataFeed.

http:\/\/schema.org\/editor.rdfs:label: editor
http:\/\/schema.org\/editor.rdfs:comment: Specifies the Person who edited the CreativeWork.

http:\/\/schema.org\/thumbnail.rdfs:comment: Thumbnail image for an image or video.
http:\/\/schema.org\/thumbnail.rdfs:label: thumbnail

http:\/\/schema.org\/maintainer.rdfs:label: maintainer
http:\/\/schema.org\/maintainer.rdfs:comment: A maintainer of a Dataset, software package (SoftwareApplication), or other Project. A maintainer is a Person or Organization that manages contributions to, and/or publication of, some (typically complex) artifact. It is common for distributions of software and data to be based on "upstream" sources. When maintainer is applied to a specific version of something e.g. a particular version or packaging of a Dataset, it is always possible that the upstream source has a different maintainer. The isBasedOn property can be used to indicate such relationships between datasets to make the different maintenance roles clear. Similarly in the case of software, a package may have dedicated maintainers working on integration into software distributions such as Ubuntu, as well as upstream maintainers of the underlying work.

http:\/\/schema.org\/accessMode.rdfs:label: accessMode
http:\/\/schema.org\/accessMode.rdfs:comment: The human sensory perceptual system or cognitive faculty through which a person may process or perceive information. Expected values include: auditory, tactile, textual, visual, colorDependent, chartOnVisual, chemOnVisual, diagramOnVisual, mathOnVisual, musicOnVisual, textOnVisual.

http:\/\/schema.org\/mentions.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the CreativeWork contains a reference to, but is not necessarily about a concept.
http:\/\/schema.org\/mentions.rdfs:label: mentions

http:\/\/schema.org\/offers.rdfs:label: offers
http:\/\/schema.org\/offers.rdfs:comment: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event. Use businessFunction to indicate the kind of transaction offered, i.e. sell, lease, etc. This property can also be used to describe a Demand. While this property is listed as expected on a number of common types, it can be used in others. In that case, using a second type, such as Product or a subtype of Product, can clarify the nature of the offer.

http:\/\/schema.org\/releasedEvent.rdfs:comment: The place and time the release was issued, expressed as a PublicationEvent.
http:\/\/schema.org\/releasedEvent.rdfs:label: releasedEvent

http:\/\/schema.org\/creator.rdfs:comment: The creator/author of this CreativeWork. This is the same as the Author property for CreativeWork.
http:\/\/schema.org\/creator.rdfs:label: creator

http:\/\/schema.org\/aggregateRating.rdfs:comment: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.
http:\/\/schema.org\/aggregateRating.rdfs:label: aggregateRating

http:\/\/schema.org\/recordedAt.rdfs:label: recordedAt
http:\/\/schema.org\/recordedAt.rdfs:comment: The Event where the CreativeWork was recorded. The CreativeWork may capture all or part of the event.

http:\/\/schema.org\/regionsAllowed.rdfs:comment: The regions where the media is allowed. If not specified, then it's assumed to be allowed everywhere. Specify the countries in ISO 3166 format.
http:\/\/schema.org\/regionsAllowed.rdfs:label: regionsAllowed

http:\/\/schema.org\/creativeWorkStatus.rdfs:comment: The status of a creative work in terms of its stage in a lifecycle. Example terms include Incomplete, Draft, Published, Obsolete. Some organizations define a set of terms for the stages of their publication lifecycle.
http:\/\/schema.org\/creativeWorkStatus.rdfs:label: creativeWorkStatus

http:\/\/schema.org\/image.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.
http:\/\/schema.org\/image.rdfs:label: image

http:\/\/schema.org\/associatedMedia.rdfs:comment: A media object that encodes this CreativeWork. This property is a synonym for encoding.
http:\/\/schema.org\/associatedMedia.rdfs:label: associatedMedia

http:\/\/schema.org\/uploadDate.rdfs:label: uploadDate
http:\/\/schema.org\/uploadDate.rdfs:comment: Date when this media object was uploaded to this site.

http:\/\/schema.org\/expires.rdfs:label: expires
http:\/\/schema.org\/expires.rdfs:comment: Date the content expires and is no longer useful or available. For example a VideoObject or NewsArticle whose availability or relevance is time-limited, or a ClaimReview fact check whose publisher wants to indicate that it may no longer be relevant (or helpful to highlight) after some date.

http:\/\/schema.org\/productionCompany.rdfs:comment: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.
http:\/\/schema.org\/productionCompany.rdfs:label: productionCompany

http:\/\/schema.org\/representativeOfPag.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether this image is representative of the content of the page.
http:\/\/schema.org\/representativeOfPag.rdfs:label: representativeOfPage

http:\/\/schema.org\/materialExtent.rdfs:label: materialExtent
http:\/\/schema.org\/materialExtent.rdfs:comment: The quantity of the materials being described or an expression of the physical space they occupy.

http:\/\/schema.org\/sdDatePublished.rdfs:comment: Indicates the date on which the current structured data was generated / published. Typically used alongside sdPublisher
http:\/\/schema.org\/sdDatePublished.rdfs:label: sdDatePublished

http:\/\/schema.org\/identifier.rdfs:label: identifier
http:\/\/schema.org\/identifier.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.

http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityAPI.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the resource is compatible with the referenced accessibility API (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values).
http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityAPI.rdfs:label: accessibilityAPI

http:\/\/schema.org\/discussionUrl.rdfs:comment: A link to the page containing the comments of the CreativeWork.
http:\/\/schema.org\/discussionUrl.rdfs:label: discussionUrl

http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilitySummar.rdfs:comment: A human-readable summary of specific accessibility features or deficiencies, consistent with the other accessibility metadata but expressing subtleties such as "short descriptions are present but long descriptions will be needed for non-visual users" or "short descriptions are present and no long descriptions are needed."
http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilitySummar.rdfs:label: accessibilitySummary

http:\/\/schema.org\/version.rdfs:label: version
http:\/\/schema.org\/version.rdfs:comment: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified resource.

http:\/\/schema.org\/publishingPrinciple.rdfs:comment:
The publishingPrinciples property indicates (typically via URL) a document describing the editorial principles of an Organization (or individual e.g. a Person writing a blog) that relate to their activities as a publisher, e.g. ethics or diversity policies. When applied to a CreativeWork (e.g. NewsArticle) the principles are those of the party primarily responsible for the creation of the CreativeWork.

While such policies are most typically expressed in natural language, sometimes related information (e.g. indicating a funder) can be expressed using schema.org terminology.
http:\/\/schema.org\/publishingPrinciple.rdfs:label: publishingPrinciples

http:\/\/schema.org\/bitrate.rdfs:comment: The bitrate of the media object.
http:\/\/schema.org\/bitrate.rdfs:label: bitrate

http:\/\/schema.org\/character.rdfs:comment: Fictional person connected with a creative work.
http:\/\/schema.org\/character.rdfs:label: character

http:\/\/schema.org\/sdPublisher.rdfs:comment: Indicates the party responsible for generating and publishing the current structured data markup, typically in cases where the structured data is derived automatically from existing published content but published on a different site. For example, student projects and open data initiatives often re-publish existing content with more explicitly structured metadata. The sdPublisher property helps make such practices more explicit.
http:\/\/schema.org\/sdPublisher.rdfs:label: sdPublisher

http:\/\/schema.org\/license.rdfs:label: license
http:\/\/schema.org\/license.rdfs:comment: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL.

http:\/\/schema.org\/learningResourceTyp.rdfs:comment: The predominant type or kind characterizing the learning resource. For example, 'presentation', 'handout'.
http:\/\/schema.org\/learningResourceTyp.rdfs:label: learningResourceType

http:\/\/schema.org\/translator.rdfs:label: translator
http:\/\/schema.org\/translator.rdfs:comment: Organization or person who adapts a creative work to different languages, regional differences and technical requirements of a target market, or that translates during some event.

http:\/\/schema.org\/educationalUse.rdfs:label: educationalUse
http:\/\/schema.org\/educationalUse.rdfs:comment: The purpose of a work in the context of education; for example, 'assignment', 'group work'.

http:\/\/schema.org\/publisher.rdfs:label: publisher
http:\/\/schema.org\/publisher.rdfs:comment: The publisher of the creative work.

http:\/\/schema.org\/educationalAlignmen.rdfs:comment: An alignment to an established educational framework.
http:\/\/schema.org\/educationalAlignmen.rdfs:label: educationalAlignment

http:\/\/schema.org\/additionalType.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
http:\/\/schema.org\/additionalType.rdfs:label: additionalType

http:\/\/schema.org\/startTime.rdfs:comment:
The startTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to start. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December. For media, including audio and video, it's the time offset of the start of a clip within a larger file.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.
http:\/\/schema.org\/startTime.rdfs:label: startTime

http:\/\/schema.org\/alternativeHeadline.rdfs:comment: A secondary title of the CreativeWork.
http:\/\/schema.org\/alternativeHeadline.rdfs:label: alternativeHeadline

http:\/\/schema.org\/conditionsOfAccess.rdfs:comment:
Conditions that affect the availability of, or method(s) of access to, an item. Typically used for real world items such as an ArchiveComponent held by an ArchiveOrganization. This property is not suitable for use as a general Web access control mechanism. It is expressed only in natural language.

For example "Available by appointment from the Reading Room" or "Accessible only from logged-in accounts ".
http:\/\/schema.org\/conditionsOfAccess.rdfs:label: conditionsOfAccess

http:\/\/schema.org\/requiresSubscriptio.rdfs:comment: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription (either paid or free). Allowed values are true or false (note that an earlier version had 'yes', 'no').
http:\/\/schema.org\/requiresSubscriptio.rdfs:label: requiresSubscription

http:\/\/schema.org\/genre.rdfs:comment: Genre of the creative work, broadcast channel or group.
http:\/\/schema.org\/genre.rdfs:label: genre

http:\/\/schema.org\/isAccessibleForFree.rdfs:comment: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.
http:\/\/schema.org\/isAccessibleForFree.rdfs:label: isAccessibleForFree

http:\/\/schema.org\/inLanguage.rdfs:comment: The language of the content or performance or used in an action. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also availableLanguage.
http:\/\/schema.org\/inLanguage.rdfs:label: inLanguage

http:\/\/schema.org\/commentCount.rdfs:label: commentCount
http:\/\/schema.org\/commentCount.rdfs:comment: The number of comments this CreativeWork (e.g. Article, Question or Answer) has received. This is most applicable to works published in Web sites with commenting system; additional comments may exist elsewhere.

http:\/\/schema.org\/endTime.rdfs:label: endTime
http:\/\/schema.org\/endTime.rdfs:comment:
The endTime of something. For a reserved event or service (e.g. FoodEstablishmentReservation), the time that it is expected to end. For actions that span a period of time, when the action was performed. e.g. John wrote a book from January to December. For media, including audio and video, it's the time offset of the end of a clip within a larger file.

Note that Event uses startDate/endDate instead of startTime/endTime, even when describing dates with times. This situation may be clarified in future revisions.

http:\/\/schema.org\/sdLicense.rdfs:comment: A license document that applies to this structured data, typically indicated by URL.
http:\/\/schema.org\/sdLicense.rdfs:label: sdLicense

http:\/\/schema.org\/sameAs.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
http:\/\/schema.org\/sameAs.rdfs:label: sameAs

http:\/\/schema.org\/spatial.rdfs:comment: The "spatial" property can be used in cases when more specific properties (e.g. locationCreated, spatialCoverage, contentLocation) are not known to be appropriate.
http:\/\/schema.org\/spatial.rdfs:label: spatial

http:\/\/schema.org\/disambiguatingDescr.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
http:\/\/schema.org\/disambiguatingDescr.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

http:\/\/schema.org\/isBasedOnUrl.rdfs:comment: A resource that was used in the creation of this resource. This term can be repeated for multiple sources. For example, http://example.com/great-multiplication-intro.html.
http:\/\/schema.org\/isBasedOnUrl.rdfs:label: isBasedOnUrl

http:\/\/schema.org\/isBasedOn.rdfs:comment: A resource from which this work is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption.
http:\/\/schema.org\/isBasedOn.rdfs:label: isBasedOn

http:\/\/schema.org\/funder.rdfs:label: funder
http:\/\/schema.org\/funder.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.

http:\/\/schema.org\/sponsor.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports a thing through a pledge, promise, or financial contribution. e.g. a sponsor of a Medical Study or a corporate sponsor of an event.
http:\/\/schema.org\/sponsor.rdfs:label: sponsor

http:\/\/schema.org\/thumbnailUrl.rdfs:comment: A thumbnail image relevant to the Thing.
http:\/\/schema.org\/thumbnailUrl.rdfs:label: thumbnailUrl

http:\/\/schema.org\/contentUrl.rdfs:comment: Actual bytes of the media object, for example the image file or video file.
http:\/\/schema.org\/contentUrl.rdfs:label: contentUrl

http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityFeatur.rdfs:comment: Content features of the resource, such as accessible media, alternatives and supported enhancements for accessibility (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values).
http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityFeatur.rdfs:label: accessibilityFeature

http:\/\/schema.org\/awards.rdfs:label: awards
http:\/\/schema.org\/awards.rdfs:comment: Awards won by or for this item.

http:\/\/schema.org\/award.rdfs:label: award
http:\/\/schema.org\/award.rdfs:comment: An award won by or for this item.

http:\/\/schema.org\/temporalCoverage.rdfs:label: temporalCoverage
http:\/\/schema.org\/temporalCoverage.rdfs:comment:
The temporalCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the period that the content applies to, i.e. that it describes, either as a DateTime or as a textual string indicating a time period in ISO 8601 time interval format. In the case of a Dataset it will typically indicate the relevant time period in a precise notation (e.g. for a 2011 census dataset, the year 2011 would be written "2011/2012"). Other forms of content e.g. ScholarlyArticle, Book, TVSeries or TVEpisode may indicate their temporalCoverage in broader terms - textually or via well-known URL. Written works such as books may sometimes have precise temporal coverage too, e.g. a work set in 1939 - 1945 can be indicated in ISO 8601 interval format format via "1939/1945".

Open-ended date ranges can be written with ".." in place of the end date. For example, "2015-11/.." indicates a range beginning in November 2015 and with no specified final date. This is tentative and might be updated in future when ISO 8601 is officially updated.

http:\/\/schema.org\/correction.rdfs:comment: Indicates a correction to a CreativeWork, either via a CorrectionComment, textually or in another document.
http:\/\/schema.org\/correction.rdfs:label: correction

http:\/\/schema.org\/contentReferenceTim.rdfs:comment: The specific time described by a creative work, for works (e.g. articles, video objects etc.) that emphasise a particular moment within an Event.
http:\/\/schema.org\/contentReferenceTim.rdfs:label: contentReferenceTime

http:\/\/schema.org\/associatedArticle.rdfs:comment: A NewsArticle associated with the Media Object.
http:\/\/schema.org\/associatedArticle.rdfs:label: associatedArticle

http:\/\/schema.org\/interactivityType.rdfs:label: interactivityType
http:\/\/schema.org\/interactivityType.rdfs:comment: The predominant mode of learning supported by the learning resource. Acceptable values are 'active', 'expositive', or 'mixed'.

http:\/\/schema.org\/accountablePerson.rdfs:label: accountablePerson
http:\/\/schema.org\/accountablePerson.rdfs:comment: Specifies the Person that is legally accountable for the CreativeWork.

http:\/\/schema.org\/contentRating.rdfs:label: contentRating
http:\/\/schema.org\/contentRating.rdfs:comment: Official rating of a piece of content—for example,'MPAA PG-13'.

http:\/\/schema.org\/fileFormat.rdfs:label: fileFormat
http:\/\/schema.org\/fileFormat.rdfs:comment: Media type, typically MIME format (see IANA site) of the content e.g. application/zip of a SoftwareApplication binary. In cases where a CreativeWork has several media type representations, 'encoding' can be used to indicate each MediaObject alongside particular fileFormat information. Unregistered or niche file formats can be indicated instead via the most appropriate URL, e.g. defining Web page or a Wikipedia entry.

http:\/\/schema.org\/encodingFormat.rdfs:comment:
Media type typically expressed using a MIME format (see IANA site and MDN reference) e.g. application/zip for a SoftwareApplication binary, audio/mpeg for .mp3 etc.).

In cases where a CreativeWork has several media type representations, encoding can be used to indicate each MediaObject alongside particular encodingFormat information.

Unregistered or niche encoding and file formats can be indicated instead via the most appropriate URL, e.g. defining Web page or a Wikipedia/Wikidata entry.
http:\/\/schema.org\/encodingFormat.rdfs:label: encodingFormat

http:\/\/schema.org\/copyrightHolder.rdfs:comment: The party holding the legal copyright to the CreativeWork.
http:\/\/schema.org\/copyrightHolder.rdfs:label: copyrightHolder

http:\/\/schema.org\/sourceOrganization.rdfs:label: sourceOrganization
http:\/\/schema.org\/sourceOrganization.rdfs:comment: The Organization on whose behalf the creator was working.

http:\/\/schema.org\/typicalAgeRange.rdfs:comment: The typical expected age range, e.g. '7-9', '11-'.
http:\/\/schema.org\/typicalAgeRange.rdfs:label: typicalAgeRange

http:\/\/schema.org\/timeRequired.rdfs:comment: Approximate or typical time it takes to work with or through this learning resource for the typical intended target audience, e.g. 'PT30M', 'PT1H25M'.
http:\/\/schema.org\/timeRequired.rdfs:label: timeRequired

http:\/\/schema.org\/author.rdfs:label: author
http:\/\/schema.org\/author.rdfs:comment: The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.

http:\/\/schema.org\/locationCreated.rdfs:label: locationCreated
http:\/\/schema.org\/locationCreated.rdfs:comment: The location where the CreativeWork was created, which may not be the same as the location depicted in the CreativeWork.

http:\/\/schema.org\/embedUrl.rdfs:label: embedUrl
http:\/\/schema.org\/embedUrl.rdfs:comment: A URL pointing to a player for a specific video. In general, this is the information in the src element of an embed tag and should not be the same as the content of the loc tag.

http:\/\/schema.org\/copyrightYear.rdfs:comment: The year during which the claimed copyright for the CreativeWork was first asserted.
http:\/\/schema.org\/copyrightYear.rdfs:label: copyrightYear

http:\/\/schema.org\/publication.rdfs:comment: A publication event associated with the item.
http:\/\/schema.org\/publication.rdfs:label: publication

http:\/\/schema.org\/isFamilyFriendly.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether this content is family friendly.
http:\/\/schema.org\/isFamilyFriendly.rdfs:label: isFamilyFriendly

http:\/\/schema.org\/potentialAction.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
http:\/\/schema.org\/potentialAction.rdfs:label: potentialAction

http:\/\/schema.org\/producer.rdfs:comment: The person or organization who produced the work (e.g. music album, movie, tv/radio series etc.).
http:\/\/schema.org\/producer.rdfs:label: producer

http:\/\/schema.org\/material.rdfs:comment: A material that something is made from, e.g. leather, wool, cotton, paper.
http:\/\/schema.org\/material.rdfs:label: material

http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityContro.rdfs:label: accessibilityControl
http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityContro.rdfs:comment: Identifies input methods that are sufficient to fully control the described resource (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values).

http:\/\/schema.org\/encodings.rdfs:comment: A media object that encodes this CreativeWork.
http:\/\/schema.org\/encodings.rdfs:label: encodings

http:\/\/schema.org\/encoding.rdfs:comment: A media object that encodes this CreativeWork. This property is a synonym for associatedMedia.
http:\/\/schema.org\/encoding.rdfs:label: encoding

http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityHazard.rdfs:label: accessibilityHazard
http:\/\/schema.org\/accessibilityHazard.rdfs:comment: A characteristic of the described resource that is physiologically dangerous to some users. Related to WCAG 2.0 guideline 2.3 (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values).

http:\/\/schema.org\/subjectOf.rdfs:label: subjectOf
http:\/\/schema.org\/subjectOf.rdfs:comment: A CreativeWork or Event about this Thing.

http:\/\/schema.org\/about.rdfs:comment: The subject matter of the content.
http:\/\/schema.org\/about.rdfs:label: about

http:\/\/schema.org\/encodesCreativeWork.rdfs:comment: The CreativeWork encoded by this media object.
http:\/\/schema.org\/encodesCreativeWork.rdfs:label: encodesCreativeWork

http:\/\/schema.org\/isPartOf.rdfs:comment: Indicates an item or CreativeWork that this item, or CreativeWork (in some sense), is part of.
http:\/\/schema.org\/isPartOf.rdfs:label: isPartOf

http:\/\/schema.org\/hasPart.rdfs:comment: Indicates an item or CreativeWork that is part of this item, or CreativeWork (in some sense).
http:\/\/schema.org\/hasPart.rdfs:label: hasPart

http:\/\/schema.org\/translationOfWork.rdfs:comment: The work that this work has been translated from. e.g. 物种起源 is a translationOf “On the Origin of Species”
http:\/\/schema.org\/translationOfWork.rdfs:label: translationOfWork

http:\/\/schema.org\/workTranslation.rdfs:label: workTranslation
http:\/\/schema.org\/workTranslation.rdfs:comment: A work that is a translation of the content of this work. e.g. 西遊記 has an English workTranslation “Journey to the West”,a German workTranslation “Monkeys Pilgerfahrt” and a Vietnamese  translation Tây du ký bình khảo.

http:\/\/schema.org\/workExample.rdfs:label: workExample
http:\/\/schema.org\/workExample.rdfs:comment: Example/instance/realization/derivation of the concept of this creative work. eg. The paperback edition, first edition, or eBook.

http:\/\/schema.org\/exampleOfWork.rdfs:label: exampleOfWork
http:\/\/schema.org\/exampleOfWork.rdfs:comment: A creative work that this work is an example/instance/realization/derivation of.

http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntity.rdfs:comment: Indicates the primary entity described in some page or other CreativeWork.
http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntity.rdfs:label: mainEntity

http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntityOfPage.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage
http:\/\/schema.org\/mainEntityOfPage.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.

http:\/\/schema.org\/CreativeWork.rdfs:label: CreativeWork
http:\/\/schema.org\/CreativeWork.rdfs:comment: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

http:\/\/schema.org\/MediaObject.rdfs:label: MediaObject
http:\/\/schema.org\/MediaObject.rdfs:comment: A media object, such as an image, video, or audio object embedded in a web page or a downloadable dataset i.e. DataDownload. Note that a creative work may have many media objects associated with it on the same web page. For example, a page about a single song (MusicRecording) may have a music video (VideoObject), and a high and low bandwidth audio stream (2 AudioObject's).

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/h.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà lega il punto di inreresse alla sua categoria generale.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/h.rdfs:label: ha categoria del punto di interesse

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/h.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà lega il punto di interesse alla situazione (evento) del suo nome ch ecambia nel tempo.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/h.rdfs:label: ha name in time of the point of interest

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/h.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà lega il punto di interesse al suo stato.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/h.rdfs:label: ha stato del punto di interesse

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà lega un punto di interesse multiplo a tutti i  punti di interesse in esso contenuti.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:label: include punto di interesse

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:comment: Inverse property of "includes point of interest".
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:label: is included in point of interest

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:comment: Proprietà inversa di "ha categoria del punto di interesse".
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:label: is point of interest category for

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:comment: Inverse property of "has point of interest name in time".
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:label: is point of interest name in time for

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:comment: Proprietà inversa di "ha stato del punto di interesse".
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/i.rdfs:label: is point of interest status for

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta l'identificativo univoco del punto di interesse.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: identificativo punto di interesse

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta un nome alternativo (acrononimo, o altro nome) con cui è conosciuto il punto di interesse.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: nome alternativo del punto di interesse

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà è l'identificativo nel vocabolario controllato della categoria dei punti di interesse. E' equivalente a dct:identifier e skos:notation utilizzati nel vocabolario controllato stesso.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: POI category identifier

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta l'etichetta (nome) della categoria del punto di interesse.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: name of point of interest category

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta una generica descrizione del punto di interesse.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: descrizione del punto di interesse

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta il nome ufficiale del punto di interesse.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: nome ufficiale del punto di interesse

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa proprietà rappresenta l'etichetta (stringa) dello stato del punto di interesse.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: status

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/M.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta una collezione di punti di interesse. Per esempio un centro commerciale è un punto di interesse ma a sua volta una collezioni di tanti punti di interesse (farmacia, negozi, ristoranti, cinema, ecc.)
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/M.rdfs:label: Multiple Point Of Interest

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta la situazione del nome del punto di interesse che cambia nel tempo. Essa è rappresentata quindi come una relazione ennaria tra il punto di interesse, il tempo e il nome. Questa classe può essere utile nel caso si voglia tracciare l'evoluzione dei nomi di punti di interesse nel tempo.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: Name in Time of the Point of Interest

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta lo stato del punto di interesse. I suoi valori possono essere fissati per tipologia di punto di interesse. Per esempio, essi possono essere "di turno", "aperta", "chiusa", ecc. per le farmacie oppure "libero", "occupato" per i parcheggi, oppure "aperto", "chiuso", "in ristrutturazione" nel caso di strutture ricettive, ecc.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: Point of Interest Status

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta un punto di interesse, ovvero un particolare punto che qualcuno trova utile o di interesse. Esso può essere un parcheggio, una struttura ricettiva, una feramta dell'autobus, una farmacia, un centro commerciale, un incrocio, ecc. E' da notare che questa classe rappresenta di fatto una sovrastruttura utile per modellare cose di interesse ma allo stesso tempo è anche accettato considerarla come luogo (infatti la classe è definita come sotto classe di "Entity-Entità" dell'ontologia L0 che a sua volta può essere un oggetto o un luogo). Questo tipo di modellazione quindi consente a utenti di poter cercare oggetti di interesse ma anche fare query su punti di interessse intesi come luoghi.
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: Point of Interest

https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:comment: Questa classe rappresenta la categoria attraverso cui classificare il punto di interesse. Essa assume i valori di un vocabolario controllato (che sarà rilasciato nelle prossime settimane e ispirato dalla classificazione di Open Street Map) che identifica in linea generale i tipi di punti di interesse come per esempio: divertimento, cibo, servizio pubbico, viaggi/turismo, ecc. I suoi individui possono essere anche sottoclassi della classe Punto di Interesse (questa tecnica di modellazione in OWL si chiama Punning).
https:\/\/w3id.org\/italia\/onto\/POI\/P.rdfs:label: Categoria del Punto di Interesse
